tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PassengerInformation (
  passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  ticket_number VARCHAR UNIQUE,
  reservation_status BOOLEAN,
  boarding_gate VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_id INT REFERENCES passengers(passenger_id),
  ticket_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  departure_date DATE,
  seat_number INT
);

CREATE TABLE tickets (
  ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_id UUID,
  ticket_type STRING,
  fare DECIMAL,
  issue_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE passengers (
  passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_id INT,
  ticket_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE reservations (
  reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_id INT,
  reservation_date DATE,
  seat_number VARCHAR(5),
  route_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE boarding_details (
  boarding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reservation_id INT,
  boarding_time TIMESTAMP,
  boarding_gate VARCHAR(10),
  boarding_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_location VARCHAR(50),
  end_location VARCHAR(50),
  distance DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
